channel.title: Sunagakure Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Sunagakure Village" - The Village Hidden in the Sand

item.title: Sunagakure Village
item.content:encoded:
Current stuck at 30 members, only half of them active. Current Upgrades include:
Hitaiate Maker
Party House
Banker
Collection Squad
Fortified Walls
Spy Towers
Sentry Squads
Ninja Attack Squad
Infiltration Academy
Creepy Traps
War Council
Overseers
Science! Workshop
Jonin Council
Black Market
Natural Research Facility
Tasty Ramen Shop
Connections
Elemental Shield
Potion Palace
Forest Trail
Ninja Cooking School
Spy Network
Fanboy Stink Moatm
